section.heading: Limitation on purchases.
section.text: The Board of Education shall purchase for use in the public schools only such books and supplies as shall have been duly recommended by the Superintendent of Schools and formally approved by the Board of Education.

annoGroup.heading: Cross References
annoGroup.annotation: Additional powers and duties of Superintendent, see § 38-105.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 13-172 deleted “, through the Office of Contracting and Procurement” preceding “purchase for use”.
